cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 19th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 19th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Great for a couple of buddies or family for their own space in a standalone cabin. You will have your own space while being able to mingle with other people on site as you wish. The Twin Cabins come with 2 Single Beds, a shelving unit, heater and linen.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Great for a couple or single person who wants their own space in a standalone cabin. You will have your own space while being able to mingle with other people on site as you wish. The Queen Cabins come with 1 Queen Bed, a shelving unit, heater and linen.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 19th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 19th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
